attributes.additional_details: WE ARE THE LAUGHING STOCK  AND WHIPPING BOY  AT THE MOMENT ,THE PEOPLE HERE HAVE HAD ENOUGH . 95% OF THE IMMIGRANTS ARE YOUNG MEN  OF A DIFFERENT CULTURE  AND FREELY ROAM THE STREETS THEN GO BACK TO THEIR HOTEL  THE COUNTRY IS PAYING FOR,WE FEED THEM, HOUSE THEM, LET  OVERPAID IMMIGRATION LAWYERS APPEAL  ON TOTALLY RIDICULOUS GROUNDS. AND THIS DISSENT IS SPREADING ALL OVER EUROPE ,LISTEN TO THE PEOPLE THAT PUT YOU  IN PARLIAMENT BEFORE IT IS TOO LATE
attributes.background: SET UP SATELLITE  IMMIGRATION CONTROL IN CALAIS, DEAL WITH THEM THERE,  IF THEY GET ACROSS SEND THEM BACK. IF THEY HAVE NO DOCUMENTATION .WE DO NOT KNOW  WHO WE ARE  LETTING  COME INTO THE COUNTRY. FOR GOD'S SAKE  WAKE UP,  THEY TRAVEL  HALF WAY ROUND EUROPE  THROUGH SAFE TOWNS  TO GET TO HERE

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean in terms of how the Government should deal with illegal migrants and where you would like illegal migrants arriving in the UK to be returned to.

The UK already operates border controls in France, including in Calais, to combat illegal migration. You can find more information here: https://homeofficemedia.blog.gov.uk/2017/07/11/fact-sheet-the-uks-juxtaposed-border-controls/

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what specific action you would like the Government or Parliament to do in regards to combating illegal migration.
